page.title: 17Armed Robbery in Haddenham
page.content: Armed robbers broke into Haddenham Post Office on{Thursday June 27, 1985. They{stole some money}and the Post master's car, which was found later by Police.The{three men}hurt the Post Master with a shotgun. He is in Stoke Mandeville Hospital with{two broken {fingers and cuts and bruises.}The Post Master is{Mr Ralph Morton.}Staff in the Post Office refused to talk to us about the robbery and{letters were {still delivered on Friday. A neighbour of Mr Morton said she was in the garden when the robbery happened, but didn't hear anything. The robbery disturbed the village which is normally quiet.
